industry: Retail Health and Personal Care Products
description:
Our client, a growing beauty brand, is looking for a Sales Coordinator to join their team!

As the Sales Coordinator you will play a vital role in supporting the Account Sales Manager and ensuring the smooth operation of customer account needs, sales activities, and administrative processes.

Location-Glendale, CA
Salary-Up to $65K DOE

**What You Will Do:**
• Assist the Account Sales Manager or Key Account Manager in managing and servicing customer accounts by coordinating communication, resolving inquiries, and addressing client needs in a timely and professional manner.
• Collaborate closely with the sales team to ensure effective order processing, order tracking, and on-time delivery to clients. Manage and maintain accurate sales records and client data.
• Build and maintain positive relationships with clients, acting as a point of contact for routine requests, order updates, and general information. Ensure clients receive exceptional service.
• Coordinate the needs of the client with internal teams to ensure clients’ request and execution are timely and complete.
• Process and coordinate orders from clients, including order entry, order confirmation, and order status updates. Address any issues or discrepancies that may arise during the order fulfillment process.
• Develop a strong understanding of our cosmetic products, ingredients, and offerings to effectively respond to client queries and provide information as needed.
• Assist in preparing sales reports and forecasts, helping track
performance against sales targets and objectives. Utilize CRM systems to manage customer interactions and sales data.
• Provide general administrative assistance to the sales team, including managing schedules, preparing documents, and coordinating meetings.
• Gather and report on market trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences to assist the sales team in adjusting strategies and identifying opportunities.
• Represent the company at trade shows, industry events, and product launches to showcase our cosmetics and engage with potential clients.
• Maintain open communication with clients through phone, email, and other communication channels, ensuring they are well-informed and satisfied.

**Who You Are:**
• Minimum 2 years of experience in a sales support or customer service role, with prior experience in Account Management, cosmetics/beauty/skincare.
• Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for interacting with clients and internal teams.
• Ability to address challenges and find solutions in a fast-paced environment.
• Motivated & proactive with a customer-centric mindset.
• Experience working with interdepartmental teams & managing multiple projects at once.
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office, with an emphasis on Excel & PowerPoint.
• Customer-focused and proactive mindset
• Familiar with CRM & ERP Software
• Strong verbal and written communication
• Analytical with a results-oriented mindset.
• Proficient in administrative tasks and other assignments as needed.
